column4: hi .. just instaled 9.04 -- under vmware fusion on osx 10.5.6 -- very nice.. fast.. now I'm trying to install some new software -- I went to the add/remove programs drop down.. selected "ALL" .. but it doesn't see "tcsh" "emacs"  "bash" ... am I doing something wrong?  why can't it find these very basic programs ?
you want synaptic for installing stuff
the add/remove programs is more like for installing end-user applications
